title: kalpakAmbikaiyin
sahitya:
kalpakAmbikaiyin kazhal bhajippOrkku kAla bhayamEdu shrI kapAli


anupallavi

  pal piNi shiTrarivuDaiya namadu bandha vinai aghala vandaruL tarum shrI


caraNam    anbuDan aDi paNi mAniDarkkum - pErinbam virumbum vAnavarkkum
Enburugap-pADum nAlvarukkum tunbam aak-karuNai pozhiyum mativadana
